title: SmartContract
content:
- ### OntologyBlock
  id:: smartcontract-ontology
  collapsed:: true
	- ontology:: true
	- term-id:: BC-0101
	- preferred-term:: SmartContract
	- status:: active
	- public-access:: true
	- definition:: Self-executing contracts with terms directly written into code that automatically enforce and execute agreements when predetermined conditions are met on a blockchain network.
	- maturity:: mature
	- owl:class:: bc:SmartContract
	- owl:physicality:: ConceptualEntity
	- owl:role:: Object
	- owl:equivalentClass:: bc:SmartContract
	- belongsToDomain:: [[BlockchainDomain]]
	- #### CrossDomainBridges
	  id:: smartcontract-bridges
	  collapsed:: true
		- dt:uses:: [[Bias Detection Methods]]
		- bc:authenticates:: [[DigitalAvatar]]
		- bc:governs:: [[Marketplace]]

ontology.definition: Self-executing contracts with terms directly written into code that automatically enforce and execute agreements when predetermined conditions are met on a blockchain network.

errors: Missing required property: is-subclass-of (at least one parent class)
